```{r setup, include=FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```

```{r}

library(ggplot2) # beautiful graphs

library(patchwork) # stitch graphs together

whatIwantedtosee <- c("laughing", "something else", "laughing", "something else")

where <- c("in the purple rain", "in the purple rain", "somewhere else", "somewhere else")

count <- c(100, 0, 0, 0)

mydata <- tibble::tibble(whatIwantedtosee, where, count)

```

```{r}

ggplot(mydata, 
       aes(x = whatIwantedtosee, y = where, size = count, color = count)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "I only wanted to see you ...", x = "what I wanted to see", y = "where") +
  scale_color_viridis_c(guide = "legend", direction = -1) +
  scale_size_continuous(range = c(0, 30)) +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")

```
